item.description:
Hey Salsa FAns:

Join me for a fun evening of Salsa Dancing. I will be wearing a fedora hat and will be staninding near the entrance

 

 Here are the Details:

 "Well this month has been very busy with so many great dance events and socials! Because of this busy month we decided to take a break and now we are back bigger and better. We have a real treat for everyone and I am super excited to announce that we are bringing the hand-down hottest and best Mambo DJ from Florida.

DJ Rob Fernandez doesn't need any introduction in Florida. He is the preferred DJ for any big event and is always guaranteed to have everyone dancing from start to finish. Since starting these ... socials it has always been a dream of mine to bring him to Boston and it's finally happening. Prepare to be blown away!!

Prepare yourself for an evening of fun for all dancers alike. Prepare for "Fuego Y Candela"!!!

Music: DJ Rob Fernandez from Orlando, FL!!

Date: October 6th, 2012

Time: 6:00pm-10:00pm

Cost: $8

Parking: Available on the street and in a municipal lot a block away at the corner of Cambridge Street and Warren Street.

http://mapq.st/h/4-mVJ84f5L

Hope to see you all there!! "

 

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a fedora hat and will be staninding near the entrance

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Fuego Y Candela October Salsa Social
